original_text: Israel's people are like an olive tree that a farmer has planted. But God has broken off some of that tree's branches. Then he has taken a branch from a wild olive tree. He has put that wild branch into the farmer's tree, to become part of that tree. You Gentiles are like the wild branch. Now you receive food from the root of the farmer's tree, to make you strong. Israel's people are like an olive tree that a farmer has planted. But God has broken off some of that tree's branches. Then he has taken a branch from a wild olive tree. He has put that wild branch into the farmer's tree, to become part of that tree. You Gentiles are like the wild branch. Now you receive food from the root of the farmer's tree, to make you strong.
korean_text: 또한 가지 얼마가 꺾이었는데 돌감람나무인 네가 그들 중에 접붙임이 되어 참감람나무 뿌리의 진액을 함께 받는 자가 되었은즉

sentences.original_text: Israel's people are like an olive tree
But God has broken off some of that tree's branches
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 그 나무의 가지 일부를 꺾으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he has taken a branch from a wild olive tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 들올리브 나무에서 가지를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He has put that wild branch into the farmer's tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 들가지를 농부의 나무에 넣었습니다

sentences.original_text: to become part of that tree
You Gentiles are like the wild branch
Now you receive food from the root of the farmer's tree
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 농부의 나무 뿌리에서 양식을 받습니다

sentences.original_text: Israel's people are like an olive tree
But God has broken off some of that tree's branches
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 그 나무의 가지 일부를 꺾으셨습니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 들올리브 나무에서 가지를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He has put that wild branch into the farmer's tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 들가지를 농부의 나무에 넣었습니다
